title: no end of season rewards?
body: why didnt i get my rewards for the end of season, i got banned a few months ago but i got told that it would only affect it if i was banned or chat restricted by the end of the season

replies.body:
> Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.

[source](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon)
